title.value: Elixhauser Comorbid Condition Value Set for diabetes without chronic complications

description.value: Elixhauser Comorbid Condition Value Set for diabetes without chronic complications. ICD-10 codes are drawn from https://www.hcup-us.ahrq.gov/toolssoftware/comorbidityicd10/comorbidity_icd10.jsp, version 2021.1
